at.tugraz.kmi.medokyservice.recommendations

Class Intervention

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.tugraz.kmi.medokyservice.recommendations.Intervention
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TwitterActivityIntervention

    public abstract class Intervention
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Intervention is a super class to all various types of interventions. Interventions always refer to micro adaptations within a user's experience in a particular learning environment.
    Author:
    Simone Kopeinik
